Title: h3PointDistKm
Description: Returns the "great circle" or "haversine" distance between pairs of GeoCoord points (latitude/longitude) pairs in kilometers.
lat1, lon1 — Latitude and Longitude of point1 in degrees. Float64.lat2, lon2 — Latitude and Longitude of point2 in degrees. Float64.
Haversine or great circle distance in kilometers. Float64.
